title.rendered: Wireless Bluetooth 5.0 In-Ear Headphones with Charging Box, Built-in Microphone, Touch Control, 40 Hours Lasting, 3D HD…

content.rendered:
Key Features

【IPX5 Waterproof】

IPX5 waterproof expertise for day by day use, splashes and sweat is not going to injury the headphones. [Attention] Not appropriate for swimming, heavy rain.

【Portable and Long Lasting Charging Case】

Thanks to the low energy consumption, the totally charged Bluetooth headphones (only one hour) can provide a playtime of 3-4 hours. The easy and ultra-light charging case can cost the headphones 3-4 occasions.

【Touch Control LED Display and Battery】

By touching the contact factors of the headset with your fingers, you possibly can choose the final / subsequent music, reply/reject the decision or activate Siri, and so forth. The distinctive good digital show can simply verify the battery capability.

【One-Step Reconnection】

We adopted essentially the most superior Bluetooth 5.0 expertise to make sure a extra steady connection, decrease delay and decrease energy consumption, after paired for the primary time, simply take out the headphones from the charging case and they may robotically hook up with your telephone.

【Comfort Fit + Our Service】

Comes with ear muffs (S/M/L) to make sure one of the best match attainable. PS: Please be happy to contact us if there’s any downside with the earphone, we are going to reply you inside 24 hours.

Package consists of:

2 x Bluetooth headphones.

Earplugs S / M / L

1 x USB cable.

1 x English handbook.

1 x charging field.
